name: satori-workspace
description: Workspace containing Satori design system and consumer projects

scripts.build:all: npm run build:plugin && npm run build:consumer
scripts.test:all: npm run test:plugin && npm run test:consumer
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:plugin && npm run lint:consumer
scripts.link:local: npm run link:satori-packages && npm run link:consumer
scripts.link:satori-packages: cd packages/satori && npm run build:all && npm link dist/packages/satori-ui && npm link dist/packages/satori-devkit && npm link dist/packages/satori-cic
scripts.clean: npm run clean:satori && npm run clean:consumer
